metadata.name: mother/child v1-dv1 #1/3
metadata.description:
Auriea Harvey’s mother/child, is derived from a 3d scan of the artist’s niece and her son, made as they slept in the backseat of a car during a road trip in 2016. It is the artist’s contemporary version of a pietà, in the spirit of Michelangelo's famous iteration, just a few blocks from the artist’s home. The artist captures a quiet and candid moment in the day of a young mother, capturing the joy and youthful exuberance via color choices and the use of the silk-like ribbons. Though the child represented in red symbolizes the heavy burden of parenthood, the duo relax into one another in peace and equilibrium.

Interactive GLB, 3D model in HTML environment, animation, AR

About the Edition:  
This sculpture has been minted on the Ethereum Blockchain under the personal contract of Auriea Harvey. 
1 edition available for sale as NFT only.  
1 edition to be sold in combine with the physical sculpture (contact the artist for more information.)  
1 artist edition, vaulted by the artist.
